entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
